Estonia: The Livonian Diet is formed to solve internal disputes in Livonia.
France: John the Fearless was assassinated by companions of the dauphin. He was succeeded by his son Philip the Good, who would ally himself with the English against the French crown.
Japan: Ōei Invasion to Wokou bases on Tsushima Island
Malta: The Militia List is drawn up, giving information about the population of Malta in the Middle Ages.
